20110118000800.000|20110118000802.000|CC1|CALIFORNIA AND THE STREETS      
20110118000802.000|20110118000804.000|CC1|WERE LINED WITH FANS OF ALL     
20110118000804.000|20110118000804.000|CC1|AGES.                           
20110118000804.000|20110118000806.000|CC1|THE YOUNGEST ONES BROUGHT BY    
20110118000806.000|20110118000808.000|CC1|PARENTS WHO WANT TO ENSURE

20110118000810.000|20110118000812.000|CC1|>> I'VE BEEN COMING OUT HERE    
20110118000812.000|20110118000813.000|CC1|FOR EIGHT YEARS AND THE         
20110118000813.000|20110118000815.000|CC1|LEGEND OF A MAN WHO DID

20110118000825.000|20110118000826.000|CC1|PEOPLE OUT HERE CELEBRATING.
